goals.goal: Discuss the cataloging of data for the thesis.
goals.status: Objective Achieved: Yes, a plan for cataloging data was discussed and actions were outlined.

goals.goal: Plan the delivery of the thesis by October.
goals.status: Objective Achieved: Yes, the timeline for submission was confirmed.

goals.goal: Establish partnerships with professors for data validation.
goals.status: Objective Achieved: Yes, potential professors for collaboration were identified.

goals.goal: Implement user authentication for the web application.
goals.status: Objective Achieved: Yes, a plan for user authentication was discussed and resources were allocated.

goals.goal: Prepare a mockup for the platform.
goals.status: Objective Achieved: Yes, discussions about the design and mockup were initiated.

goals.goal: Finalize the API outputs and ensure functionality.
goals.status: Objective Achieved: Yes, the API outputs were confirmed to be functional.

goals.goal: Create a plan for the MVP to present to stakeholders.
goals.status: Objective Achieved: Yes, a preliminary plan was developed, and further discussions are scheduled.

goals.goal: Discuss the integration of AI regulations into the project.
goals.status: Objective Achieved: Yes, discussions on the implications of GDPR and AI Act were held.

goals.goal: Set up a roadmap for future development phases.
goals.status: Objective Achieved: Yes, a roadmap for upcoming tasks was discussed and established.
